label: uncl5189
comment: Code specifying the identification of an allowance or charge.

values.label: Handling commission
values.comment: Fee for the processing of documentary credit, collection and payment which are charged to the customer.

values.label: Amendment commission
values.comment: Fee for amendments in documentary credit and collection business (not extensions and increases of documentary credits).

values.label: Acceptance commission
values.comment: Fee for the acceptance of draft in documentary credit and collection business which are drawn on us (also to be seen as a kind of 'guarantee commission').

values.label: Commission for obtaining acceptance
values.comment: Fee for obtaining an acceptance under collections on the basis of 'documents against acceptance'.

values.label: Commission on delivery
values.comment: Fee for delivery of documents without corresponding payment.

values.label: Advising commission
values.comment: Fee for advising documentary credits (charged also in case of confirmed credits).

values.label: Confirmation commission
values.comment: Fee for confirmation of credit.

values.label: Deferred payment commission
values.comment: Fee for the deferred payment period under documentary credits confirmed by bank. This fee are charges for the period from presentation of the document until due date of payment.

values.label: Commission for taking up documents
values.comment: Fee charged to the foreign bank for the processing of documentary credit.

values.label: Opening commission
values.comment: Fee for opening revocable documentary credit.

values.label: Fee for payment under reserve
values.comment: Fee charged to the customer for discrepancies in credit documents in the case of which the bank have to stipulate payment under reserve.

values.label: Discrepancy fee
values.comment: Fee charged to the foreign bank for discrepancies in credit documents.

values.label: Domicilation commission
values.comment: Fee for the domicilation of bills with the bank.

values.label: Commission for release of goods
values.comment: Commission for the release of goods sent to the bank.

values.label: Collection commission
values.comment: Fee for settling collections on the basis of 'documents against payments'.

values.label: Negotiation commission
values.comment: Fee for the purchase of documents under sight credit for the first ten days.

values.label: Return commission
values.comment: Fee for cheques, bills and collections returned unpaid and/or recalled.

values.label: B/L splitting charges
values.comment: Fee for the splitting of bills of lading.

values.label: Trust commission
values.comment: Fee for the handling on a fiduciary basis of imported goods that have been warehoused.

values.label: Transfer commission
values.comment: Fee for the transfer of transferable documentary credits.

values.label: Commission for opening irrevocable documentary credits
values.comment: Fee for opening irrevocable documentary credits. This fee is a kind of 'Guarantee commission' as compensation for the commitment into which the bank have entered on the customers behalf; similar to confirmation commission, acceptance commission.

values.label: Pre-advice commission
values.comment: Fee for the pre-advice of a documentary credit.

values.label: Supervisory commission
values.comment: Fee for the supervising unconfirmed documentary credits with a deferred payment period.

values.label: Model charges
values.comment: Fee for decoding telex messages.

values.label: Risk commission
values.comment: Commission in addition to the confirmation commission for documentary credits from sensitive countries.

values.label: Guarantee commission
values.comment: Commission for drawing up guaranties.

values.label: Reimbursement commission
values.comment: Fee for reimbursement of, for example, documentary credits.

values.label: Stamp duty
values.comment: Tax payable on bills in accordance with national bill of exchange legislation.

values.label: Brokerage
values.comment: Brokers commission arising, in trade with foreign currencies.

values.label: Bank charges
values.comment: Charges deducted/claimed by other banks involved in the transaction.

values.label: Bank charges information
values.comment: Charges not included in the total charge amount i.e. the charges are for information only.

values.label: Courier fee
values.comment: Fee for use of courier service.

values.label: Phone fee
values.comment: Fee for use of phone.

values.label: Postage fee
values.comment: Fee for postage.

values.label: S.W.I.F.T. fee
values.comment: Fee for use of S.W.I.F.T.

values.label: Telex fee
values.comment: Fee for telex.

values.label: Penalty for late delivery of documents
values.comment: Penalty imposed when documents are delivered late.

values.label: Penalty for late delivery of valuation of works
values.comment: Penalty imposed when valuation of works is delivered late.

values.label: Penalty for execution of works behind schedule
values.comment: Penalty imposed when the execution of works is behind schedule.

values.label: Other penalties
values.comment: Penalty imposed for other reasons.

values.label: Bonus for works ahead of schedule
values.comment: Bonus for completing work ahead of schedule.

values.label: Other bonus
values.comment: Bonus earned for other reasons.

values.label: Project management cost
values.comment: Cost for project management.

values.label: Pro rata retention
values.comment: Proportional retention charge.

values.label: Contractual retention
values.comment: Contractual retention charge.

values.label: Other retentions
values.comment: Retention charge not otherwise specified.

values.label: Interest on arrears
values.comment: Interest for late payment.

values.label: Interest
values.comment: Cost of using money.

values.label: Charge per credit cover
values.comment: Unit charge per credit cover established.

values.label: Charge per unused credit cover
values.comment: Unit charge per unused credit cover.

values.label: Minimum commission
values.comment: Minimum commission charge.

values.label: Factoring commission
values.comment: Commission charged for factoring services.

values.label: Chamber of commerce charge
values.comment: Identifies the charges from the chamber of commerce.

values.label: Transfer charges
values.comment: Charges for transfer.

values.label: Repatriation charges
values.comment: Charges for repatriation.

values.label: Miscellaneous charges
values.comment: Not specifically defined charges.

values.label: Foreign exchange charges
values.comment: Charges for foreign exchange.

values.label: Agreed debit interest charge
values.comment: Charge for agreed debit interest

values.label: Manufacturer's consumer discount
values.comment: A discount given by the manufacturer which should be passed on to the consumer.

values.label: Fax advice charge
values.comment: Charge for fax advice.

values.label: Due to military status
values.comment: Allowance granted because of the military status.

values.label: Due to work accident
values.comment: Allowance granted to a victim of a work accident.

values.label: Special agreement
values.comment: An allowance or charge as specified in a special agreement.

values.label: Production error discount
values.comment: A discount given for the purchase of a product with a production error.

values.label: New outlet discount
values.comment: A discount given at the occasion of the opening of a new outlet.

values.label: Sample discount
values.comment: A discount given for the purchase of a sample of a product.

values.label: End-of-range discount
values.comment: A discount given for the purchase of an end-of-range product.

values.label: Charge for a customer specific finish
values.comment: A charge for the addition of a customer specific finish to a product.

values.label: Incoterm discount
values.comment: A discount given for a specified Incoterm.

values.label: Point of sales threshold allowance
values.comment: Allowance for reaching or exceeding an agreed sales threshold at the point of sales.

values.label: Technical modification costs
values.comment: Costs for technical modifications to a product.

values.label: Job-order production costs
values.comment: Costs of job-order production.

values.label: Off-premises costs
values.comment: Expenses for non-local activities.

values.label: Additional processing costs
values.comment: Costs of additional processing.

values.label: Attesting charge
values.comment: Costs of official attestation.

values.label: Rush delivery surcharge
values.comment: Charge for increased delivery speed.

values.label: Special construction costs
values.comment: Charge for costs incurred as result of special constructions.

values.label: Freight charges
values.comment: Amount to be paid for moving goods, by whatever means, from one place to another.

values.label: Packing charge
values.comment: Charge for packing.

values.label: Repair charge
values.comment: Charge for repair.

values.label: Loading charge
values.comment: Charge for loading.

values.label: Setup charge
values.comment: Charge for setup.

values.label: Testing charge
values.comment: Charge for testing.

values.label: Warehousing charge
values.comment: Charge for storage and handling.

values.label: Gold surcharge
values.comment: Difference between current price and basic value contained in product price in relation to gold content.

values.label: Copper surcharge
values.comment: Difference between current price and basic value contained in product price in relation to copper content.

values.label: Material surcharge/deduction
values.comment: Surcharge/deduction, calculated for higher/ lower material's consumption.

values.label: Lead surcharge
values.comment: Difference between current price and basic value contained in product price in relation to lead content.

values.label: Price index surcharge
values.comment: Higher/lower price, resulting from change in costs between the times of making offer and delivery.

values.label: Platinum surcharge
values.comment: Difference between current price and basic value contained in product price in relation to platinum content.

values.label: Silver surcharge
values.comment: Difference between current price and basic value contained in product price in relation to silver content.

values.label: Wolfram surcharge
values.comment: Difference between current price and basic value contained in product price in relation to wolfram content.

values.label: Aluminum surcharge
values.comment: Difference between current price and basic value contained in product price in relation to aluminum content.

values.label: Discount
values.comment: A reduction from a usual or list price.

values.label: Insurance
values.comment: Charge for insurance.

values.label: Minimum order / minimum billing charge
values.comment: Charge for minimum order or minimum billing.

values.label: Material surcharge (special materials)
values.comment: Surcharge for (special) materials.

values.label: Surcharge
values.comment: An additional amount added to the usual charge.

values.label: Special rebate
values.comment: A return of part of an amount paid for goods or services, serving as a reduction or discount.

values.label: Carbon footprint charge
values.comment: A monetary amount charged for carbon footprint related to a regulatory requirement.

values.label: Fixed long term
values.comment: A fixed long term allowance or charge.

values.label: Temporary
values.comment: A temporary allowance or charge.

values.label: Standard
values.comment: The standard available allowance or charge.

values.label: Yearly turnover
values.comment: An allowance or charge based on yearly turnover.

values.label: Withheld taxes and social security contributions
values.comment: The amount of taxes and contributions for social security, that is subtracted from the payable amount as it is to be paid separately.
